Uses of Package
org.ingatan.data

Packages that use org.ingatan.data
org.ingatan.component.image Classes to do with Ingatan's inbuilt image editor, including the image editor itself as ImageEditorPane. 
org.ingatan.component.librarymanager Subcomponents of the library manager, as well as the LibraryManagerWindow itself. 
org.ingatan.component.quiztime The quiz window and settings dialog, as well as the TableQuestionUnit which is central to how TableQuestions are broken up and arranged in a sensible order. 
org.ingatan.data Data encapsulation classes. 
org.ingatan.io Classes that deal with general input and output of data, including parsing and writing, zip packaging, and the generation of quizzes. 
 

Classes in org.ingatan.data used by org.ingatan.component.image
Library
          Encapsulates a library of questions.

          This is an implementation of the IQuestion interface.
 

Classes in org.ingatan.data used by org.ingatan.component.quiztime

          Interface for Questions.

          This is an implementation of the IQuestion interface.
 

Classes in org.ingatan.data used by org.ingatan.data
IQuestion
          Interface for Questions.
QuizHistoryEntry
          Describes a single quiz history entry, the results and libraries used.
 

Classes in org.ingatan.data used by org.ingatan.io
AnswerFieldsFile
          This class encapsulates the data from the answer fields file.
Group
          Encapsulates a group of libraries.
IQuestion
          Interface for Questions.
Library
          Encapsulates a library of questions.
QuizHistoryFile
          Quiz history including a record for each time a quiz has been entered, the result, and how many questions were asked/skipped and also what libraries were included.
